org.xlattice.crypto

Class RSAInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.crypto.RSAInfo

  • public class RSAInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for collecting RSA key information from an XML file and returning it. Convenience functions are provided to convert between base64 encoding and the BigInteger forms of the values. An RSA key is fully specified by three values n, e, and d, but more conveniently by four, replacing n with its prime factors p and q. These four values (p, q, e, and d) are stored on disk in base64-encoded form, but the RSAKey class uses BigInteger values, so we provide methods using both representations. Used to be in org.xlattice.crypto.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon
